roleset.name: create

example.name: straight transitive
example.text: The plant will mass-produce control devices used in motor vehicles and household appliances.
example.arg: control devices used in motor vehicles and household appliances.

example.name: passivized
example.text: The test and Learning Materials are both mass-produced by the same company, Macmillan/McGraw-Hill.

example.name: with benefactive
example.text: A contractor will mass-produce vital equipment for the Army and Navy.

roleset.note: Avoid adjectival usages like "sugar producing nations"

predicate.note: Frames file for 'mass-produce' based on transformation of 'produce'. No examination of actual sentences.
